segments.text: Let's go to the cinema by bus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Better take the subway . It's far quicker and more convenient .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , it will be a new experience for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a rather comprehensive subway system here . You can get almost anywhere rather quickly on a subway , especially at this time of day when the traffic is heavy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do we pay the fare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just give the man sitting there three yuan and he'll give you a ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to pay an additional fare to change trains ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you don't have to . Here comes the train . Be careful ! Subway doors open and close automatically .
segments.speaker: S2
